name: depo-iq-fullstack
description: **Depo IQ** is a full-stack application for managing topics, built with modern technologies for scalability, security, and performance. The application is interacts with MongoDB for data persistence and Redis for caching.

scripts.install:all: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.dev: cd ./server && npm run dev & cd ./client && npm run dev
scripts.build: cd ./server && npm run build && cd ./client && npm run build
